snippet: The actor and literary agent gained space and a tree-filled view when he moved to his current apartment.
abstract: Actor and literary agent Edward Hibbert loves his alcove studio apartment in a West Village postwar co-op, enhanced by a stage carpenter with bookcases and pullout compartments to ensure clutter-free living.
lead_paragraph: The actor and literary agent gained space and a tree-filled view when he moved to his current apartment.

headline.print_headline: The Actor and Literary Agent as Editor of His Space
headline.main: Edward Hibbert on His West Village Studio
